Neural network for FIFA player position ranking based on physical attributes

Attributes were used
"age","height_cm","weight_kg","overall","weak_foot","skill_moves","shooting","passing","dribbling","defending","physic".

The neural network has a 95% hit rate for the modified dataset that has 5 possible positions; Goalkeeper, defender, midfielder, midfielder and striker.
